title: The Last Wife
writer: Vo Nguyen Dan, Trieu Hoang My, Duc Nguyen
short_cast: Kaity Nguyen, Thuan Nguyen, Quang Thang, Kim Oanh, Ngoc Diep, Nguyen Anh Dung, Quóc Huy, Luu Ly
cast: Kaity Nguyen, Thuan Nguyen, Quang Thang, Kim Oanh, Ngoc Diep, Nguyen Anh Dung, Quóc Huy, Luu Ly
genre: Vietnamese, Drama Movies, Romantic Movies, Movies Based on Books, Period Pieces
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 16 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 16
desc: Tormented by her obligations, the third wife of a district governor risks further hardship when she explores her feelings for a childhood sweetheart.
